for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
    print(['YES', 'NO'][all((not x & 1 for x in arr)) or (not n & 1 and all((x & 1 for x in arr)))])

    print(['YES', 'NO'][all((not x & 1 for x in arr)) or (not n & 1 and all((x & 1 for x in arr)))])

I = input
for _ in [0] * int(I()):
    n = int(I())
    o = sum((int(x) % 2 for x in I().split()))
    print('NYOE S'[0 < o < n + n % 2::2])

for _ in [0] * int(I()):

    o = sum((int(x) % 2 for x in I().split()))
    print('NYOE S'[0 < o < n + n % 2::2])

I = input
for _ in [0] * int(I()):
    I()
    a = s = 0
    b = 1
    for x in I().split():
        x = int(x) & 1
        a |= x
        b &= x
        s ^= x
    print('YNEOS'[a < 1 or 0 < b > s::2])

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    a = [int(j) for j in input().split()]
    q = sum((1 for k in a if k & 1))
    print(('NO', 'YES')[0 < q < n or (0 < q <= n and n & 1)])
